articles.author: Ishani Duttagupta
articles.title: Delay in getting dates from US Embassy hits travel plans of H-1B visa holders
articles.description: Thousands of Indians in the US who are on H-1B visas are facing challenges in planning international travel, including visiting family in India, because they need a valid visa stamp on their passports before they travel back to the US.
